GO Pass.title: GO Pass: Into the Wild

bonuses: +1 Candy XL from Max Battles
+1 Candy XL from raids
+1 Candy from Max Battles
+1 Candy from raids
2× Incense Duration
5,000 additional XP from completed Max Battles
5,000 additional XP from completed raids

GO Pass.description:
Before Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global kicks off around the world, take this chance to sharpen your skills and prepare for your big adventure! Hyper Training is back with the debut of the Silver Bottle Cap!
From Monday, November 10, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, November 16, at 6:00 p.m. local time, the GO Pass and the GO Pass Deluxe for Into the Wild will be available in Pokémon GO!

Wild Area.title: Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global

bonuses: 1/2 Hatch Distance for Eggs placed in Incubators during the event
1/2 Stardust cost for trades
2× Candy for catching Pokémon
3/4 Max Particle cost for unlocking and powering up Max Moves
Daily Max Particle collection limit increased to 1,600
Daily Max Particle collection limit increased to 3,200
Increased Max Particles from Power Spots and exploration**
Increased chance of 5 km Eggs from spinning PokéStops and Photo Discs at Gyms
Increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon*
Lure Modules activated will last for two hours
Six GO Snapshot surprise event encounters per day
There will be no limit on Remote Raids from Saturday, November 15, to Sunday, November 16, 2025
Three GO Snapshot surprise event encounters per day
Up to six Special Trades per day
Up to six free Raid Passes per day by spinning Photo Discs at Gyms
Up to three free Raid Passes per day by spinning Photo Discs at Gyms
You can use a Charged TM to help a Shadow Pokémon forget the Charged Attack Frustration

Wild Area.description:
Need a Last Minute Guide? Check it out here
Trainers around the world can gear up for a worldwide adventure during Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global, available in-game for two days only!
Looking to enhance your GO Wild Area weekend with exclusive Special Research, additional bonuses, and an increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon? Purchase a global event ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store!
Tickets for Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global are available now in the in-game Shop and Pokémon Go Web Store for $11.99 USD.
Trainers who purchase their Pokémon GO Wild Area: Global ticket on the Pokémon GO Web Store will receive a special avatar item—the Flower Crown!
You can purchase your ticket on the web store until the last day of the event to receive this avatar item.
For details on the in-person event in Nagasaki, Japan, click here.

PokéStop Showcase.title: Cresselia, Darkrai, and Grimmsnarl PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description:
There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Cresselia, Darkrai, and Grimmsnarl. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!
- Cresselia
- Darkrai
- Grimmsnarl

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Toxtricity during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Tales of Transformation. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!
On November 17, 2025, the featured Dynamax Pokémon are Toxtricity (Amped) and Toxtricity (Low Key).

Raid Battles.title: Mega Tyranitar and Mega Altaria in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Tyranitar and Mega Altaria return to Mega Raids on November 11, 2025, at 10 am local time.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League will run from November 11, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to November 18, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
- Pokémon must be at or below 1,500 CP to enter.
- Pokémon must be at or below 2,500 CP to enter.
- All Pokémon are eligible.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Sableye Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of November.
November 18: The featured Pokémon is Sableye and the special bonus is 2× Catch Stardust.
